QuestData.Title: A Celestial Experience
QuestData.Description: The human calf is arguing on our behalf. He is well-spoken; I can see why Baine Bloodhoof regards the prince so highly.$b$bStill, the argument does not go well. I am of little consequence, but you are a hero of the Horde. Perhaps you can intercede in our favor?$b$bSpeak with the White Tiger and plead our case, $r.$b$bBe careful! He may set a number of challenges before you...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Xuen and pass his tests.
